Articles.Content: I love this game, I have spent the last two weeks planning and launching a manned mission to Ike, Dres, Laythe, Bop, Pol, and maybe Eeloo, and return. and just realised that all my Kerbalnauts are dudes, as a dude, it shouldn't really bother me, but think female kerbals should be introduced.
That suggestion is made pretty frequently and is on the do-not-suggest list sticky at the top of the suggestions forum

Well I'll cut this short already because this topic was already suggested and discussed to death, it's really a dead horse now, no need to poke it any longer. Take a look at the What not to suggest list, female Kerbals is there under the miscellaneous category.

That said, thread closed.
